standard_contract.description: Default occupation contract for most private renters
standard_contract.notes: Section 173 cannot be used in first 6 months of occupation and requires 6 months' notice for periodic contracts.

fixed_term_standard.notes: Section 173 is not available during the fixed term unless a landlord's break clause applies.

conditional_rules.description: No-fault notice cannot be served in first 6 months and requires minimum 6 months' notice for periodic contracts
Fault-based and section 173 notices risk challenge if deposit was not protected and prescribed information not served
Serious rent arrears requires >= 2 months' rent (monthly) or 8 weeks' rent (weekly) at notice and hearing
Persistent arrears requires threshold reached at least 3 times in 3 years

verification.review_notes: Aligns with Renting Homes (Wales) Act 2016; requires specialist sign-off before production use.
